values: Well, for those who don`t know, i`m currently in brisbane for a week. holidays ftw! anyway, just decided to tell everyone, and i`ll be back in a few days with a nice in-depth report as to what`s been going on.
http://verenness.livejournal.com/3962.html

And with this post, I have a new Userpic.

:]

So this weekend has been okay so far. I'm in the middle of a two-day Magic: The Gathering Sneak Peek event for the upcoming set release called Eventide. Basically, we get a bunch of booster packs from the unreleased set, build decks out of it, and go play with decks that we've built in like 20 minutes :D
It's a lot of fun because we play in such a casual atmosphere. Everyone knows everyone else, so every game is friendly. Win or lose, no one cares too much. Eight people play, so the person who comes last always has a "WOO, TOP EIGHT!" victory, and we all have a good laugh.

In other news, I went to Strike! a couple of Mondays ago. That was fun, it was just a shame I had to leave as early as I did. Stupid full-time employment. :[
The pizzas there are to die for, they're awesome and thin and only $4 on Mondays. Cocktails were like... $6, and two games of bowling was only $10. I would definitely go there again if I get a chance.

Backwards post is backwards. Anyway, the weekend before I went to Strike!, I went to the city with some friends to take some photos. I posted the best ones up on my flickr. It was a really enjoyable day out, so great to see old friends too.


Uhm, I think that's all I have for this post, so yeah x_x Here's a youtube video. It's My Drive Thru, by Santogold, Julian Casablancas, and N.E.R.D. Apparently it was done under contract for Converse or something, but I just love the way the video clip has been made. Enjoy.

-Vance
http://verenness.livejournal.com/3664.html

Oh hey there.

Itsa me, Mari~ err, Vance/Mitchell. Hullo. Yuh, I posting again, and I swear to God, I won't regularly update this.

NOW THAT'S A PROMISE YOU CAN TAKE TO THE BANK. THE MONEY BANK.

-cough- Uhh so what's new. I've been playing C&C 3 lately, that's an awesome as game. Also, I started playing Magic: The Gathering again. I feel nerdy, but it's fun to play, so meh to you >:[

I was counting. Three of my 11 posted youtube videos have been taken down. /cry. Oh well. NOW FOR SOMETHING COMPLETELY DIFFERENT!

This song is 'That Green Gentleman', by Panic! at the Disco. Awesome song.


LOLOLOLOL. Guess what, my hair is red now. And I have a new camera. And I have goggles. Motherfucking goggles, bitches. Yeah. I'm awesome. You know it.


I'm done, buh-bye.
http://verenness.livejournal.com/3378.html

What the hell am I doing with my life?

Also, fuck you to whoever decides to comment with stupid shit like "stop being emo" or whatever the fuck you want to write. Keep it to yourself.
http://verenness.livejournal.com/3202.html

Feels like floating~


Anyway. Vance (that's me) started his new job yesterday. 8:30-5:00, Monday-Friday. x___x I'm 17, I think I'm getting in over my head. We'll see as time comes.

School is over, Work has started, and life is... moving. Nothing overly good, nothing terrifyingly bad. Just middled, really.


Sorry it's a small entry, but work makes me really tired now :\


Japes - Floating

Chill out music :]

Seriously, it is.

However, like all roller coasters, there must be more of a downhill than an uphill to keep it going.

Exams results are all done and ready to be posted, too.


English Paper One -- I forget :\ %
English Paper Two -- 43-ish%
Legal Studies -- 56%
Software Design & Development -- 49%
Modern History -- 51%
Business Studies -- 52%

Sorry for the memory lapse. Unfortunately, I failed some of my exams, and I'm expecting repercussions from this. Ah well. Just another downhill slope on the roller coaster of life.


Small entry, I figured I should write one though.


Youtube time.

CILLIT BANG REMIX BABY!
http://verenness.livejournal.com/2459.html

Yeah, I got sidetracked and really couldn't be bothered writing anything.

But here's an entry to make up for the three or so events that I've missed.


EVENT NUMBER ONE
Trial HSC has ended

Yes, it most certainly has. As of last Friday, all of my exams were completed, and I could breath a little easier.

I got some of the results back today. They were kind of lol-worthy.

English Paper One -- ??
English Paper Two -- ??
Legal Studies -- 56%
Software Design & Development -- ??
Modern History -- 51%
Business Studies -- ??


Anyway, I'll just pass these and go die in the rest of life. Sounds like a plan.


EVENT NUMBER TWO
Smash!

Smash! is a new anime convention in Australia, and it was kind of fun to go to. Plenty of artwork, collectibles, merchandise.. All so much fun. I spent around $80 there, got a few items. I'll list them again, because statistics prove that people pay more attention to brightly coloured lists.

Domo-kun T-shirt -- $20 or $25, I forget
Death Note replica -- $15
A3 Artwork -- $6
Bookmark-sized artwork -- $6
Little Bleach phone thing -- $4
Yaoi manga, for my girlfriend -- $10
Food in the Maid Cafe -- $7.50
Pokky -- $4

Now, that doesn't add up to what I said, because I'm not taking into account transport fares.

Meh. Overall, a really fun day, really well organised. Hope they run it again next year, I might even cosplay.


EVENT NUMBER THREE
Movies

Yeah, I went with Kieran to see a movie because I was bored - Saw License To Wed.
It's actually a lot funnier than I thought, but still had it's cheesy moments, with a typical romantic ending.

It was a waste of an afternoon, so all's well that ends well.


EVENT NUMBER FOUR
Return of school

Yeah... Normal lessons started again today. Got marks back, as stated above, luckily it was only a short day.

School gets a one-line entry because it's gay.



Anyway, aside from people misinterpreting what I've said, and catching me at a really bad time, life hasn't been overly terrible.

I still have issues to deal with that aren't going to come out on a public blog,  but hey. Everyone's got secrets.



Today's Youtube video is brought to you by me. The song is Wonderful Life, by Tina Cousins.




Sayonara~
http://verenness.livejournal.com/2107.html

Such sweet sounds, turned to sour shrieks in the ears of the lonely, the downtrodden, the ones who want to love.

I don't know where  exactly I fit, which category. Am I one of the happy ones who doesn't realise it? Am I looking to far ahead to notice the beauty that is right in front of me?

I don't know.

I don't care.

What's the point of living if you're so distanced from the world?

I hate it.. I really do. I've got to organise something or I'll die.

Oh well. We'll see.



Yeh, short entry. Night everyone. Youtube video is Traumst Du, by Oomph.
http://verenness.livejournal.com/1949.html

I was, actually. I came up with some huge ramble about human's need for perfection is their incurable imperfection.

However, that got washed away along with some of the dirt that was residing on my body. Shame.

ANYWAY. I've screwed up three or so friendships in the past 24 hours. I rock. Someone want to come and piss me off and take the total to four?

I screwed up my Modern History exam, but meh. I'm just not caring any more. Over the whole "study" thing.

Blah, small entry, because Eliwood was getting pissy that I wasn't updating this thing. Scary that people actually read it....

Oh yeah. "I don't dislike you, I nothing you."
Most accurate quote about how I feel lately.

Hope I didn't offend anyone with it. Not that I really care if you're offended as I'll probably never see anyone who reads this. Except maybe Kieran.

Kieran, if you read this, you're fat. :]

Time for sleep. Big day tomorrow.


Here's my mandatory youtube video.

Lasse Gjertsen's stop-motion music. Quite impressive, especially in the second half...



English Paper one ---------- Legal Studies ---------- English Paper two ---------- Software Design & Development ---------- Modern History ---------- Business Studies

ONE LEFT.
http://verenness.livejournal.com/1643.html

You'll get what the title means later, in my youtube video of the day.

Anyway. I don't know what it is, but my life has actually had stuff happen in it recently. It's kinda.. cool.

I woke up today, late as usual, but didn't think anything of it. It was about lunchtime however, I received a call from my mum, informing me that they were on their way home with a new tv..

Awesome.

Anyway, it's a nice big LCD tv. Impressive. It'll be nice to hijack and use my Wii on.

Oh, I started putting songs on my phone, seeing as how I bought a big ol' memory card for it. 1GB should hold a bit.

But yeah. When I wake up in the morning, I need to study for Modern History. Joy.

I am so screwed for this test it isn't funny... Oh well. Who said I need good marks to travel?



So, it's youtube time. Wonderful clip, if you ask me. It's "Blue" by The Birthday Massacre.




Trusting every word untrue, twilight fading....

Just like my consciousness. Slowly starting to fade. As such, I'm off to  bed. Have fun everyone.
http://verenness.livejournal.com/1486.html

...'kay.

So, my day was pretty packed. I've finished a week's worth of exams, so I decided to "chillax" and go to watch a movie.

I called up my friend[K], we headed out. We were going to watch The Simpsons Movie at 3:10 PM, and then just hang out for a bit..

Yeah, the local high school decided to have an excursion or something to that session. Joy. So we bought tickets for the 4:20 PM session, and went from there.

I'd have to say, I expected more. Overall, it was still a good laugh.


Then, on our way out (as I was desperately fiddling with my new phone to try and get their stupid bluetooth thing to work), K noticed that Die Hard 4.0 started in half an hour or something. SO, we walked around for a bit, and then watched that.

Die Hard 4.0 is a surprisingly enjoyable movie. As usual, Bruce Willis is invincible, and of course, still using his catchphrase.

After that it was starting to get kind of late, so we walked around a bit more in the dark, trying to look cool. Failing miserably, but hey.. The effort was there.


I almost got into a fistfight with some random bogan in the arcade, though. That was fun. Let's just say, I don't take lightly to being called a "fat cunt".




Also, I spent more money. $35, or something. Bought me the whole Robot Chicken season 1 on DVD. As such, I'll leave you with a song by Sick Puppies, 'All The Same'. A truly moving video.




So goodnight all you lovers, all you fighters. Reach out and touch somebody. One person can change the world, one million people can do it so much faster.
http://verenness.livejournal.com/1121.html

I've never been so depressed over having less exams.

Seriously, it sucks. I screwed up English Paper two and Software. The exams that actually mattered.

Oh well. There's plenty of other lines of work. Plus, it's only trials I guess.


I think I helped to cheer up a friend today. I hope it worked, I hate seeing people upset. Hope they get better soon.


And... yeah. I think I'm going to chill tomorrow, I'm going to go watch The Simpsons Movie, I've heard that it's an okay movie. Here's hoping they haven't lied to me.

I'm going to continue with my youtube spree, too. Hope nobody minds.

Aerosmith - I Don't Want To Miss A Thing











TRIAL COUNT:

English Paper one ---------- Legal Studies ---------- English Paper two ---------- Software Design & Development ---------- Modern History ---------- Business Studies

Two left. Fun.

So.

Don't know how many of these things I've had before, but I do know exactly how many  have died miserably. Time for a new one.

So people, once more, from the top.

Let's get this show rolling. Make it a hit.

Foo Fighters? You're up first.





Okay. That's one of the best AMV's I've ever had the pleasure of watching. So beautifully done.

Postal Service. Your turn.

Just because it's an awesome song. <3


ANYWAY. That's uhh. That's all for now.
